thread.title: Tough guy Claude Littner has a lot of work to do on The Apprentice
thread.title_full: Tough guy Claude Littner has a lot of work to do on The Apprentice

author: Telegraph Staff
title: Tough guy Claude Littner has a lot of work to do on The Apprentice
text: Tough guy Claude Littner has a lot of work to do on The Apprentice Benji Wilson casts his eye over the week's new TV, including The Apprentice, River, and Homeland The Apprentice returned this week with Claude Littner, right, replacing Nick Hewer in the boardroom Photo: PA 3:00PM BST 16 Oct 2015
